alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 2:17PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Morgan, northwestern Magoffin and northeastern Wolfe Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pekin, or near West Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grassy Creek, Rexville and Daysboro around 220 PM EDT. West Liberty, Panama, Nickell, Lizzielane, Demund, Greear, Liberty Road, Sellars, Licking River and Helechawa around 225 PM EDT. Lewis, Stacy Fork, Well Station, Caney, Malone, Payton, Cannel City, Gordon Ford, Index and Adele around 230 PM EDT. Holliday, Williams, White Oak, Lykins, Cottle, Florress, Netty, Burg and Wheel Rim around 235 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wonnie, Harper, Bloomington, Bethanna, Matthew, Hager, Epson, Cutuno, Elsie, Patton, Cisco, Kernie, Orient, Stella, Ova, Logville, Haleburg and Seiltz. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 56 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
